xxl.core.cursors.mappers
Class ReservoirSampler

java.lang.Object
  xxl.core.cursors.AbstractCursor<A>
      xxl.core.cursors.mappers.Aggregator
          xxl.core.cursors.mappers.ReservoirSampler
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.Iterator, Cursor
public class ReservoirSampler
extends Aggregator

This class shows how to make use of the reservoir-sampling function. A reservoir-sampler is an aggregator using the reservoir-sampling function with a given strategy for on-line sampling. There are three types of strategies available based on [Vit85]: Jeffrey Scott Vitter, Random Sampling with a Reservoir, in ACM Transactions on Mathematical Software, Vol. 11, NO. 1, March 1985, Pages 37-57.

See Also:
Iterator, Cursor, Aggregator

RTYPE

public static final int RTYPE
Indicates the use of type R for sampling strategy.

See Also:
ReservoirSample, ReservoirSample.RType, Constant Field Values

XTYPE

public static final int XTYPE
Indicates the use of type X for sampling strategy.

See Also:
ReservoirSample, ReservoirSample.XType, Constant Field Values

YTYPE

public static final int YTYPE
Indicates the use of type Y for sampling strategy. This type is not available so far due to the lack of information about the used distribution to determine the position in the reservoir for a sampled object.

See Also:
ReservoirSample, Constant Field Values

ZTYPE

public static final int ZTYPE
Indicates the use of type Z for sampling strategy.

See Also:
ReservoirSample, ReservoirSample.ZType, Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

ReservoirSampler

public ReservoirSampler(java.util.Iterator input,
                        int n,
                        int type,
                        ContinuousRandomWrapper crw,
                        DiscreteRandomWrapper drw)
                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Constructs a new aggregator that provides a reservoir-sampling as output.

Parameters:
input - input iteration to draw the sample from.
n - size of the sample to draw.
type - strategy used to determine the position of the treated object in the sampling reservoir.
crw - used PRNG for computing continuous random numbers.
drw - used PRNG for computing discrete random numbers.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if an unknown sampling strategy has been given.

ReservoirSampler

public ReservoirSampler(java.util.Iterator input,
                        int n,
                        int type)
                 throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Constructs a new aggregator that provides a reservoir sampling as output using a default PRNG for computing continuous random numbers and a default PRNG for computing discrete random numbers.

Parameters:
input - iteration to draw the sample from.
n - size of the sample to draw.
type - strategy used to determine the position of the treated object in the sampling reservoir.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if an unknown sampling strategy has been given.

ReservoirSampler

public ReservoirSampler(java.util.Iterator input,
                        ReservoirSample reservoirSample)
Constructs a new aggregator that provides a reservoir sampling as output.

Parameters:
input - iteration to draw the sample from.
reservoirSample - function providing an online sampling.
